Changelog
=========

0.1.3 - 0.1.4
----------------

* Little adjustments to instructions, required fields and URL handling [miiohtama] 

0.1.2 - 0.1.3
-----------------

* No changes (reuploaded to p.org)

0.1.1 - 0.1.2
----------------

* Updated README

* Added French translations [toutp]

* Require phone number from everyone to decrease the amount of spam

0.1 - 0.1.1
----------------

* Added unit tests

* Added phone number validation

* Added German and Finnish translations

0.1
-------------------

* Initial release
